questions.question: I think ……………………….. it was a mistake.
questions.description: We use that to introduce a noun clause.

questions.question: ……………………….. he received the message he rushed to his home.
He worked hard ………………………….. he could make his parents proud.
questions.description: So that is used to express the purpose.

questions.question: …………………………. he is not there we will leave a message with his mother.
questions.description: We use if to express a condition.

questions.question: He was buried in the village ……………………………. he was born.
questions.description: We can use where to introduce adverb clauses of place.

questions.question: The soldiers were poorly armed ……………………….. they put up a brave fight.
questions.description: We use but to connect two contrasting ideas.

questions.question: She earns more ………………………….. I do.
questions.description: We use than after a comparative expression.

questions.question: …………………………. we don’t start now, we may miss the train.
………………………… you do your work conscientiously, you cannot succeed.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: The farmer killed the hen ………………………………. laid golden eggs.
questions.description: In relative clauses we use which to refer to things or animals.

questions.question: He fled ……………………….. he was afraid.
questions.description: Because is a conjunction it gives the reason for something.
